column1: Seven Stars is a common symbol throughout Arda.
It refers to the constellation that turns through the northern skies every night of the year. To the Elves this was the Valacirca that signalled the downfall of Morgoth
column2: but the Men of the Northern lands called it simply Valacirca. The Seven Stars are today known as the Plough
